body:
Hi Claus,


The mksource tool is part Radiance which is available from:


    http://www.radiance-online.org/
    or
    http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/


If you are not familiar with it, Radiance is a physically based 
simulation toolset design for lighting, daylighting and visualization. 
The image format used in Radiance is the original HDR image format.


Regards,


-Jack de Valpine




# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
